title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 189.5 - Cost-sharing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 189.5 - Cost-sharing

State Regulations

The amount of cost-sharing for historical record program
grant projects, other than those involving arrangement, description and other
work relating directly to the administration of historical records held by a
program, shall be 20 percent. For historical records program grants to the

State University of New York (SUNY) only, funds provided from the SUNY budget
shall be deemed to be local funds and in-kind services funded from the SUNY
budget shall be deemed to be local in-kind services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
189.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
